alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 3:45PM CDT until July 16 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Eastern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 345 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Horine, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Festus, Waterloo, Pevely, Crystal City, Red Bud, Herculaneum, Barnhart, Antonia, Valmeyer, Olympian Village, Fountain, New Design, Horine, Imperial, Hecker, Maeystown, Kimmswick, Fults, Madonnaville, and Chalfin Bridge. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 170 and 187. This also includes Mastodon Historic Site and Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
